channel.title: *Loading - Please wait. Checking for updates - 1%*
channel.description:
So recently downloaded Nexon's source and stuff, dementhium**
And I tried to run the client but it stops at "Loading - Please wait." "Checking for updates - 1%" and doesn't progress from there. There's a client file and GameServer file but I don't know how to run it properly, help?

item.title: *Loading - Please wait. Checking for updates - 1%*
item.dc:creator: @DeezNugz96 DeezNugz96
item.description:
@DeezNugz96 wrote:

This is what contains in the GameServer file;

This is what is in the Client file;

Does it matter if they’re batch files or what?

Read full topic

item.title: *Loading - Please wait. Checking for updates - 1%*
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Make sure you’re running the server before running the client. It’s some difference in higher revision servers that means it has to make a connection before loading.

Read full topic
